Type 2 is distinguished from type 3 by the presence of a cloverleaf-shaped head, which is caused by more extensive fusion of bones in the skull.",GHR,Pfeiffer syndrome
How many people are affected by Pfeiffer syndrome ?,"Pfeiffer syndrome affects about 1 in 100,000 individuals.",GHR,Pfeiffer syndrome
